original: Lagerberg, Per Gustaf Pontus, fd. kapten, fd. trafikdirektör, länstrafikledare, Prässebo, f. 28/7/78 i Skövde av kapt. Sven L. o. Maria Bagge. G. 13 rn. Sigrid Pira. Barn: Sigrid Ebba Anna Maria f. 14, Swen Emanuel Per 16, Kerstin o. Birgit 20. — Mog:ex. i Skara 98, off :ex. 00, KHS 05-07. Und:-löjtn. v. Skarab. reg. 00, löjtn. 03, reg:adjut. 07-08, tjg. v. SJ mil rbyrå o. ensk. järnv. 08-09, tjg. v, genistaben 10-12, på övergrstat 12, i res. 14, kapt. i res. 15. Förste byråassist. v. Bergslag. Järnv. 12, trafikinsp. i Filipstad 17, i Gbg 19, trafikdir. där s. å., v. verkst. dir. i Trafikförvaltn. Gbg-Dal.-Gävle 36-44, länstrafikled, i Älvsb. 1. sed. 44. V. brandchef i Filipstad 14-17, ord. dito 18, led. av o. v. ordf. i Gbgs spårvrstyr., led. av styr. o. verk-st. dir. f. Kil-Fryksdalens Järnv. A-B t. 45, styr :led. o. v. ordf. i Gbg-Särö Järnv. A-B, led. av styr. f. Sv. järnv. arb :giv :fören. o. Sv. järnv :fören. t. 44. RSO, RNO, RVO, RDDO, RNS:tOO-Ikl, Idr:Gm, SkytteGm. ^Lagerborg, Karl Henrik, provinsialläkare, Grästorp, f. 10/2/93 i Falköp. av stadsfiskal Karl Edvard L. o. Hulda Carlsson. G. 33 m. Hjördis Holmquist. Barn: Birgit f. 3^ — Stud:ex. i Skara 13, med. kand. i Upps. 17, med. lic. i Sthlm 22. E. läk. i Tidaholm 21 o. 22, assist :läk. v. Falköp. las. 23, und:läk. där 23-27, bitr. läk. v. Gbgs barnsjukh. kir. avd. samt kort. för-ordn. s. prov:läk. i Munkfors, Trollhättans, Teckomatorps o. Laholms distr. 27, tf. e. prov:läk. i Munkfors distr. 27-28, provrläk. i Röstånga distr. 28-29, i Grästorps distr. sed. 29.
translated:
Lagerberg, Per Gustaf Pontus, former captain, former traffic director, county traffic manager, Prässebo, b. 28/7/78 in Skövde to Capt. Sven L. and Maria Bagge. M. 13 with Sigrid Pira. Children: Sigrid Ebba Anna Maria b. 14, Swen Emanuel Per b. 16, Kerstin and Birgit b. 20. — Bachelor of Laws in Skara 98, Officer's Examination 00, Royal Military Academy 05-07. Second Lieutenant in Skarab. reg. 00, Lieutenant 03, regimental adjutant 07-08, service in SJ military office and private railways 08-09, service in the engineering staff 10-12, on reserve status 12, captain in reserve 15. First Bureau Assistant in Bergslag. Railways 12, traffic inspector in Filipstad 17, in Gothenburg 19, traffic director there the same year, deputy managing director in Traffic Administration Gothenburg-Dalarna-Gävle 36-44, county traffic manager in Älvsborg county since 44. Deputy fire chief in Filipstad 14-17, regular fire chief 18, member and vice chairman of Gothenburg tramway board, member of the board and managing director of Kil-Fryksdalen Railway Co. until 45, board member and vice chairman of Gothenburg-Särö Railway Co., board member of Swedish Railway Workers' Association and Swedish Railway Society until 44. The Royal Order of the Sword, Royal Order of the North Star, Royal Victorian Order, Royal Danish Order of Dannebrog, Order of Vasa. Gymnastics Association, Shooting Association.

Lagerborg, Karl Henrik, provincial physician, Grästorp, b. 10/2/93 in Falköping to city prosecutor Karl Edvard L. and Hulda Carlsson. M. 33 with Hjördis Holmquist. Child: Birgit b. 3^. — Matriculated in Skara 13, Bachelor of Medicine in Uppsala 17, Medical Licentiate in Stockholm 22. Assistant physician in Tidaholm 21 and 22, assistant physician at Falköping hospital 23, intern physician there 23-27, assistant physician at Gothenburg children's hospital surgical department and temporarily appointed as district physician in Munkfors, Trollhättan, Teckomatorp and Laholm districts 27, acting district physician in Munkfors district 27-28, district physician in Röstånga district 28-29, in Grästorp district since 29.

structured.name: Per Gustaf Pontus Lagerberg

membership.name: Royal Order of the North Star
